sickAnswer: %s *Gasp* You're feeling sick? Oh no! Hey %s, we need your assistance!
injuredAnswer: %s Injured?! Oh no! %s! Someone needs your help!
hurtAnswer: %s Awww you're hurt? Let me call %s, she will fix you up. :heart:
sadAnswer: %s Come here you poor cutie. %s? Could you spend a moment of your time to cheer up our attendee? :heart:
happyAnswer: You're feeling happy, %s? Yay! :heart: You did a wonderful job again, dear %s. :heart:
